name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 8
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Early March 2018
posts.description: Last week we announced official support for Server-Side Rendering in Aurelia [blog/2018/02/25/server-side-rendering]. This week we're announcing an update to our Webpack tooling to support Webpack 4.0! We've also got a number of incremental fixes and small new features for other Aurelia libraries, detailed below.

posts.name: Server Side Rendering
posts.description: Without Server Side Rendering the server returns only boilerplate HTML without any content. Today we're announcing Aurelia Server Side Rendering which allows a Node.js server to render your application on the server and return the HTML of a fully rendered page.

posts.name: AureliaCasts - Creating Compelling Aurelia Video Tutorials
posts.description: This week, we're proud to have community member and creator of AureliaCasts, Nick Shallee, guest posting to share with our community what he's been up to.

posts.name: Aurelia Users Community Space Guides
posts.description: Today, I'd like to invite a long-time Aurelia Community Member, Nikolaj Ivancic, to share a little bit about the "AUCS" community project that he's leading to help improve Aurelia's documentation. Take it away Nik!

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Early February 2018
posts.description: Continuing into 2018, we've got a number of fixes and improvements to core Aurelia libraries and plugins. The details are available below.

posts.name: Big Changes in the Aurelia Router 1.5.0 Release
posts.description: Thanks to the new features in the latest update to the Aurelia router, building a beautiful and functional master-detail page in Aurelia is quick and easy.

posts.name: Aurelia 2018 Roadmap
posts.description: 2017 was a great year for Aurelia but 2018 is shaping up to be even better!
